job.title: Data Scientist
job.description:
Location - Texas
Requirements
Strong knowledge of Python and general software development skills (source code management, debugging, testing, deployment, etc.).
Strong understanding of text preprocessing and normalization techniques, such as tokenization, and POS tagging.
Ability to design NLP pipelines to meet customer requirements
Familiarity with different approaches for training entity tagging models (e.g. CRF, RNN, CNN, Transformer).
Experience with asynchronous programming is a plus.
Familiarity with deep learning frameworks such as Tensorflow and Pytorch a plus.
Familiarity with computer vision deep learning algorithms a plus (CNN, RCNN)
BS, MS and/or PhD in Mathematics, Physics, etc
Interested candidates can mail their resumes to career@kalongens.com
